Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Michigan/Chicago
ShortDescription: Revised: NB 151 Sheridan buses temp rerouted via Michigan, Ontario, State, Chicago & Michigan, due to police activity near Michigan/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Ontario, State, Chicago and Michigan, due to police activity near Michigan/Chicago.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #94 South California Temporary Reroute at Archer/40th
ShortDescription: 94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, Pershing, Kedzie, 47th, and California near Archer/40th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 South California buses are temporarily in both directions rerouted via California, Pershing, Kedzie, 47th, and resume normal route on California due to fire department activity near Archer/40th.

Allow extra travel time.
